#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long 
using namespace std;
ll min(ll a, ll b)
{
    return (a<b)? a: b;
}
ll comb(int n, int k)
{
    ll C[n+1][k+1];
    ll i, j;
 
    
    for (i = 0; i <= n; i++)
    {
        for (j = 0; j <= min(i, k); j++)
        {
          
            if (j == 0 || j == i)
                C[i][j] = 1;
 
         
            else
                C[i][j] = C[i-1][j-1] + C[i-1][j];
        }
    }
 
    return C[n][k];
}

int main()
{
	int n, m, h;
	cin>>n;
	cin>>m;
	cin>>h;
	int i;
	int s[100009];
	int sum=0;
	double c=1;
	for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
	{
		scanf("%lld", &s[i]);
		sum+=s[i];
	}
	
	//printf("%lld %lld %d %d %d\n",comb(sum-1, n-1), comb(sum-s[h], n-1), sum, s[h], n );
	if(sum<n)
	{
		printf("-1\n");
	}
	else if(sum-s[h]<n-1)
	{

	printf("%0.6lf\n", c);
}
else
{
	double x=(comb(sum-1, n-1)-comb(sum-s[h], n-1))/comb(sum-1,n-1);
	printf("%0.6Lf\n", x);
}
	

	return 0;
}
